title: properties
description: specifies schema(s) for the object properties
content: The value of this property must be an object, containing schemas.
If an instance has a property defined, and the "property" object contains a corresponding entry, then the value of the instance's property is defined by the corresponding sub-schema.

Jsonary uses the properties defined in this object (as well as the "required" keyword) to provide a requiredProperties() function, which is used by the default renderers to provide hints about which properties to add.
